text: Designate sections of a pipe type for deconstruction.
protected_text: Designate sections of a pipe type for deconstruction.
translated: 指定管道类型的部分进行解构。

text: Remove sewage from the ground and place it into barrels.
protected_text: Remove sewage from the ground and place it into barrels.
translated: 将地面污水清除并放入桶中。

text: Room is too large to heat!\nMaximum of 50 cells per heater\nAdd more sauna heaters or shrink the room
protected_text: Room is too large to heat!(PH_2)Maximum of 50 cells per heater(PH_1)Add more sauna heaters or shrink the room
translated:
房间太大，无法供暖！
每个加热器最多 50 个单元
添加更多桑拿加热器或缩小房间

text: A prison cell has no access to drinking water, build at least 1 drinking water source like a water tub or basin so that prisoners have free access to drinking water
protected_text: A prison cell has no access to drinking water, build at least 1 drinking water source like a water tub or basin so that prisoners have free access to drinking water
translated: 监狱牢房没有饮用水，应建立至少 1 个饮用水源，如水盆或水盆，以便囚犯能够自由获得饮用水

text: A water tower or water butt is required to store water pumped from wells.
protected_text: A water tower or water butt is required to store water pumped from wells.
translated: 需要水塔或水桶来储存从井中抽出的水。

text: Pumps require a piped well to access ground water.
protected_text: Pumps require a piped well to access ground water.
translated: 泵需要管道井才能获取地下水。

text: A water pump is required to pump the water from a well to a water tower.
protected_text: A water pump is required to pump the water from a well to a water tower.
translated: 需要水泵将水从井抽到水塔。

text:
After 2 days of toxic fallout the buildup will contaminate any water storage tanks connected to water wells.

Prepare by creating a reserve of water and then using a valve to disconnect the wells to protect the water from contamination before it is too late.

You can also use a deep well to access uncontaminated water, or install a water treatment system which will eliminate all contamination from water reserves.
protected_text: After 2 days of toxic fallout the buildup will contaminate any water storage tanks connected to water wells.(PH_4)(PH_3)Prepare by creating a reserve of water and then using a valve to disconnect the wells to protect the water from contamination before it is too late.(PH_2)(PH_1)You can also use a deep well to access uncontaminated water, or install a water treatment system which will eliminate all contamination from water reserves.
translated:
有毒沉降物经过 2 天后，堆积物将污染所有与水井相连的储水罐。

做好准备，先建立一个水储备，然后使用阀门断开水井，以防止水受到污染。

您还可以使用深井获取未受污染的水，或安装水处理系统，消除所有污染。水储备的污染。

text: Low cooling capacity. You can increase the power of outdoor units.
protected_text: Low cooling capacity. You can increase the power of outdoor units.
translated: 冷却能力低。您可以增加室外机的功率。

text: A sewage outlet has become blocked.
protected_text: A sewage outlet has become blocked.

text: Sewage has built up around the drain hole and is blocking the outlet.\n\nBuild more outlets or add a septic tank to create a buffer and reduce pressure on the outlets.
protected_text: Sewage has built up around the drain hole and is blocking the outlet.(PH_2)(PH_1)Build more outlets or add a septic tank to create a buffer and reduce pressure on the outlets.
translated:
污水在排水孔周围堆积并堵塞了出口。

建造更多出口或添加化粪池以形成缓冲区并减少出口压力。

text: The water temperature in this tank is too low; colonists expecting to use hot water may get annoyed.\n\nTurn on boilers, increase the heating capacity, or add another hot water tank.
protected_text: The water temperature in this tank is too low; colonists expecting to use hot water may get annoyed.(PH_2)(PH_1)Turn on boilers, increase the heating capacity, or add another hot water tank.
translated:
该水箱内的水温太低；想要使用 性感的 水的殖民者可能会感到恼火。

打开锅炉，增加加热能力，或添加另一个 性感的 水箱。

text: Must be placed over a cell with ground water.
protected_text: Must be placed over a cell with ground water.
translated: 必须放置在有地下水的牢房上方。

text: Must be placed over a cell with subsurface ice deposits
protected_text: Must be placed over a cell with subsurface ice deposits
translated: 必须放置在有地下冰沉积的单元上方

text: The fixture must be inside a room to restrict it.
protected_text: The fixture must be inside a room to restrict it.
translated: 灯具必须位于房间内才能对其进行限制。

text: Assigning requires bladder need, but {0} doesn't have bladder need.
protected_text: Assigning requires bladder need, but (PH_1) doesn't have bladder need.
translated: 分配需要膀胱需求，但 {0} 没有膀胱需求。

text: A drain has become blocked. A cleaner must clean the blockage.
protected_text: A drain has become blocked. A cleaner must clean the blockage.
translated: 下水道被堵塞了。清洁工必须清理堵塞物。

text:
A well has become polluted.

Sources of contamination:
{0}

Either move the well, remove the sources of contamination, or if you are using piped wells add a water treatment system, which will also clean contaminated water towers over time.

translated:
一口井已被污染。

污染源：
{0}

移动井，消除污染源，或者如果您使用的是管道井，则添加一个水处理系统，随着时间的推移，该系统也将清洁受污染的水塔。

text: A water tower has become polluted, posing a serious health risk to your colonists. Solve the cause of the pollution and then drain the tank, or build a water treatment system.
protected_text: A water tower has become polluted, posing a serious health risk to your colonists. Solve the cause of the pollution and then drain the tank, or build a water treatment system.
translated: 一座水塔已被污染，对殖民者造成严重的健康风险。解决污染原因，然后排空水箱，或建造水处理系统。

text: {0} has contracted {1} because of bad personal hygiene
protected_text: (PH_2) has contracted (PH_1) because of bad personal hygiene

text: {0} has contracted {1} from drinking untreated water
protected_text: (PH_2) has contracted (PH_1) from drinking untreated water

text: {0} has contracted {1} from drinking contaminated water

text: Limit this fixture to patients only.
protected_text: Limit this fixture to patients only.
translated: 仅限患者使用此固定装置。

text: Connect the fixtures to a nearby bed so they inherit the ownership. Hold shift to assign multiple beds
protected_text: Connect the fixtures to a nearby bed so they inherit the ownership. Hold shift to assign multiple beds
translated: 将固定装置连接到附近的床，以便它们继承所有权。按住shift分配多个床位

text: Should pawns check if anything in the room is reserved before trying to use the fixture, prevents pawns from walking in on each other to use basins and toilets at the same time
protected_text: Should pawns check if anything in the room is reserved before trying to use the fixture, prevents pawns from walking in on each other to use basins and toilets at the same time

加热单位/功率：{0} U / {1} W
冷却装置/功率：{0} U / {1} W

text: Force the boiler to run continuously.
protected_text: Force the boiler to run continuously.

text: Exhaust vents must be kept clear!
protected_text: Exhaust vents must be kept clear!

text: Thermostat overridden by hot water tanks. Set all connected hot water tanks to thermostat mode.
protected_text: Thermostat overridden by hot water tanks. Set all connected hot water tanks to thermostat mode.
translated: 恒温器被热水箱覆盖。将所有连接的 性感的 水箱设置为恒温器模式。

text: Turn on boilers for 1 hour when the tank temperature is low. If this is disabled then boilers will run continuously and ignore room thermostats.
protected_text: Turn on boilers for 1 hour when the tank temperature is low. If this is disabled then boilers will run continuously and ignore room thermostats.

text: No unreserved water sources of the highest available quality.
protected_text: No unreserved water sources of the highest available quality.

text: Toggle the valve between open and closed.
protected_text: Toggle the valve between open and closed.
translated: 在打开和关闭之间切换阀门。
质量：未经治疗 - 小 疾病风险
质量：受污染 - 高疾病风险！
质量：经过处理 - 安全

text: Drain the tank and remove contamination.
protected_text: Drain the tank and remove contamination.

text: Transfer the contents of this tank to other available tanks
protected_text: Transfer the contents of this tank to other available tanks

text: Set the level at which fecal sludge should be emptied into barrels. Fecal sludge can be moved and knocked over, burned, or turned into biosolids or fuel.
protected_text: Set the level at which fecal sludge should be emptied into barrels. Fecal sludge can be moved and knocked over, burned, or turned into biosolids or fuel.

text: Spill this barrel of sewage on the ground.
protected_text: Spill this barrel of sewage on the ground.

text: Designate areas to fertilize with biosolids.
protected_text: Designate areas to fertilize with biosolids.

text: Enables a higher priority cleaning job to clean indoors first
protected_text: Enables a higher priority cleaning job to clean indoors first
translated: 启用更高优先级的清洁工作，首先清洁室内

text:
Steps:

1: Save your game immediately after pressing confirm
2: Quit to the main menu and disable the mod and restart the game
3: Load your save game, ignore any exceptions and save it again
Load the save game once more and there shouldn't be any exceptions related to missing bad hygiene defs or classes!
protected_text: Steps:(PH_5)(PH_4)1: Save your game immediately after pressing confirm(PH_3)2: Quit to the main menu and disable the mod and restart the game(PH_2)3: Load your save game, ignore any exceptions and save it again(PH_1)Load the save game once more and there shouldn't be any exceptions related to missing bad hygiene defs or classes!
translated:
步骤：

1：按确认后立即保存游戏
2：退出主菜单并禁用模组并重新启动游戏
3：加载您的保存游戏，忽略任何异常并再次保存[
再次加载保存游戏，不应该出现任何与缺少不良卫生定义或类别相关的异常！

text: A restart is required to add quality and art comps back in.\n\n restart now?
protected_text: A restart is required to add quality and art comps back in.(PH_2)(PH_1) restart now?

需要重新启动才能重新添加质量和艺术组合。

 现在重新启动吗？

text: Enable quality and art comps for fixtures like toilets
protected_text: Enable quality and art comps for fixtures like toilets
translated: 为厕所等固定装置提供质量和艺术比较

text: Quit to main menu to change.
protected_text: Quit to main menu to change.
translated: 退出到主菜单进行更改。

text: Enable water usage on crackers and refiners in Rimefeller.
protected_text: Enable water usage on crackers and refiners in Rimefeller.
translated: 启用 Rimefeller 的裂解装置和精炼装置的用水。

text: Enable water usage on cooling towers in Rimatomics.
protected_text: Enable water usage on cooling towers in Rimatomics.

text: Manually disable needs by body type, race, or active hediff.
protected_text: Manually disable needs by body type, race, or active hediff.

text: Set if prisoners should have needs
protected_text: Set if prisoners should have needs

translated: 如果客人有需要就设置

text: Colonists care about privacy when bathing or using toilets.
protected_text: Colonists care about privacy when bathing or using toilets.

text: Set if high temperature should affect cooling efficiency like standard AC
protected_text: Set if high temperature should affect cooling efficiency like standard AC
translated: 设置高温是否会像标准空调一样影响冷却效率

text: Rain will give the same boost as sprinklers. Might reduce game performance.
protected_text: Rain will give the same boost as sprinklers. Might reduce game performance.
translated: 雨水会产生与洒水装置相同的推动力。可能会降低游戏性能。

text: Disable needs entirely. Overrides all other settings.
protected_text: Disable needs entirely. Overrides all other settings.
translated: 完全禁用需求。覆盖所有其他设置。

text: Pawns will also be allowed to drink and pack any modded drinks. VGP and RimCuisine drinks can be used default, others will require modding an extension to the def.
protected_text: Pawns will also be allowed to drink and pack any modded drinks. VGP and RimCuisine drinks can be used default, others will require modding an extension to the def.
translated: 典当也将被允许饮用和包装任何改装饮料。 VGP 和 RimCuisine 饮料可以默认使用，其他饮料则需要对 def 进行修改扩展。

text: Pawns will automatically pack water bottles into their inventory when they can.\n\nMay not work with some mods, for CE you will need to manually manage your loadout to include water bottles else they will keep dropping them.
protected_text: Pawns will automatically pack water bottles into their inventory when they can.(PH_2)(PH_1)May not work with some mods, for CE you will need to manually manage your loadout to include water bottles else they will keep dropping them.
translated:
Pawn 会在可能的情况下自动将水瓶装入其库存中。

可能不适用于某些模组，对于 CE，您需要手动管理装载以包含水瓶，否则它们会不断掉落水瓶。

text: Enable bladder need on pets. Also adds litter boxes for pets.
protected_text: Enable bladder need on pets. Also adds litter boxes for pets.
translated: 满足宠物的膀胱需求。还添加了宠物垃圾箱。

text: Enable bladder need on all wild animals. This could get messy.
protected_text: Enable bladder need on all wild animals. This could get messy.
translated: 满足所有野生动物的膀胱需求。这可能会变得混乱。

text: Enable thirst need on all colonists with bladder need. Adds drinking fountains and water bottles. Requires a restart.
protected_text: Enable thirst need on all colonists with bladder need. Adds drinking fountains and water bottles. Requires a restart.
translated: 满足所有有膀胱需求的殖民者的口渴需求。添加饮水机和水瓶。需要重新启动。

text: Set if the fertilizer grid should be visible
protected_text: Set if the fertilizer grid should be visible
translated: 设置肥料网格是否可见

text: Enables needs on non-human colonists. You can disable specific beings with the needs filter.
protected_text: Enables needs on non-human colonists. You can disable specific beings with the needs filter.
translated: 满足非人类殖民者的需求。您可以使用需求过滤器禁用特定的存在。

text:
Switch the mod into a simplified mode which removes pipes, water and sewage management, and any buildings and jobs not directly related to hygiene and thirst.

This will prevent many defs from loading and requires a restart.

If you are trying to load a save with existing hygiene buildings you may need to save and reload it after activating
protected_text: Switch the mod into a simplified mode which removes pipes, water and sewage management, and any buildings and jobs not directly related to hygiene and thirst.(PH_4)(PH_3)This will prevent many defs from loading and requires a restart.(PH_2)(PH_1)If you are trying to load a save with existing hygiene buildings you may need to save and reload it after activating
translated:
将模组切换为简化模式，移除管道、水和污水管理以及任何与卫生和口渴不直接相关的建筑物和工作。

这将阻止许多定义加载并需要重新启动。

如果您尝试加载现有卫生建筑物的保存，您可能需要在激活后保存并重新加载它

text: You must restart the game to enable Lite mode\n\nIf you are trying to load a save with existing hygiene buildings you may need to save and reload it after activating to clear errors
protected_text: You must restart the game to enable Lite mode(PH_2)(PH_1)If you are trying to load a save with existing hygiene buildings you may need to save and reload it after activating to clear errors

您必须重新启动游戏才能启用精简模式

如果您尝试加载现有卫生建筑的保存，您可能需要在激活后保存并重新加载以清除错误

text: Passive coolers have their wood fueling removed and are instead filled with water, similar to water tubs.
protected_text: Passive coolers have their wood fueling removed and are instead filled with water, similar to water tubs.
translated: 被动式冷却器去掉了木材燃料，取而代之的是充满水，类似于水桶。

text: Adds water and sewage processing to life support, and adds pipes to ship structures.
protected_text: Adds water and sewage processing to life support, and adds pipes to ship structures.
translated: 为生命支持增加水和污水处理，并为船舶结构增加管道。

text: Go to the Bad Hygiene Wiki
protected_text: Go to the Bad Hygiene Wiki
translated: 前往不良卫生维基百科

text: Limits the default shallow water grid generation to very small patches. Terrain features no longer generate water, and the radius around surface water is reduced.\n\nA new game is not required; works with existing saves.
protected_text: Limits the default shallow water grid generation to very small patches. Terrain features no longer generate water, and the radius around surface water is reduced.(PH_2)(PH_1)A new game is not required; works with existing saves.
translated:
将默认的浅水网格生成限制为非常小的补丁。地形特征不再生成水，并且地表水周围的半径减小。

不需要新游戏；与现有保存一起使用。

text: Powered growing buildings like hydroponics have water tanks that require filling from pipes. Plants die from lack of water instead of power, but water tanks only fill when the building is powered.
protected_text: Powered growing buildings like hydroponics have water tanks that require filling from pipes. Plants die from lack of water instead of power, but water tanks only fill when the building is powered.
translated: 水培等动力生长建筑物的水箱需要通过管道填充。植物会因缺水而不是缺电而死亡，但水箱只有在建筑物通电时才会充满。

text: A restart is required to add and remove thirst-related items.\n\nRestart now?
protected_text: A restart is required to add and remove thirst-related items.(PH_2)(PH_1)Restart now?
translated:
需要重新启动才能添加和删除与口渴相关的项目。

立即重新启动吗？
用于殖民者卫生的东西。

text: Bad hygiene will increase risk of disease and impact social interaction.
protected_text: Bad hygiene will increase risk of disease and impact social interaction.
translated: 不良的卫生习惯会增加患病风险并影响社交互动。

text: Diarrhea is loose, watery stools. Also known as bowel movements.
protected_text: Diarrhea is loose, watery stools. Also known as bowel movements.
translated: 腹泻是稀松的、水样的大便。也称为排便。

text: Dysentery is a type of gastroenteritis that results in diarrhea with blood.
protected_text: Dysentery is a type of gastroenteritis that results in diarrhea with blood.
translated: 痢疾是一种胃肠炎，会导致腹泻血。

text: Cholera is an infectious disease that causes severe watery diarrhea, which can lead to dehydration and even death if untreated.
protected_text: Cholera is an infectious disease that causes severe watery diarrhea, which can lead to dehydration and even death if untreated.
translated: 霍乱是一种传染病，会导致严重的水样腹泻，如果不及时治疗，可能会导致脱水甚至死亡。

text: Dehydration is a condition that can occur when the loss of body fluids, mostly water, exceeds the amount that is taken in.
protected_text: Dehydration is a condition that can occur when the loss of body fluids, mostly water, exceeds the amount that is taken in.
translated: 脱水是当体液（主要是水）的流失量超过摄入量时可能发生的情况。
从 TargetA 中取出堆肥

text: To prevent the risk of disease it is important to maintain a good level of sanitation by removing or treating waste, and preventing sewage from contaminating your water supply.
protected_text: To prevent the risk of disease it is important to maintain a good level of sanitation by removing or treating waste, and preventing sewage from contaminating your water supply.
translated: 为了预防疾病风险，重要的是通过清除或处理废物并防止污水污染供水来保持良好的卫生水平。

text: Water is required for many of life’s physiological processes. If this reaches zero then the creature will slowly die of dehydration.
protected_text: Water is required for many of life’s physiological processes. If this reaches zero then the creature will slowly die of dehydration.
translated: 生命的许多生理过程都需要水。如果达到零，那么该生物将慢慢因脱水而死亡。
用粪便污泥制造化学燃料

text: Make a batch of chemfuel from fecal sludge.
protected_text: Make a batch of chemfuel from fecal sludge.
translated: 用粪便污泥制作一批化学燃料。
从粪便污泥中提炼化学燃料

text: When properly treated and processed, sewage sludge becomes biosolids that offer a small boost to terrain fertility. Useful for harsh environments with limited space to grow. Biosolids also produce a large boost to the fertility of sand which can make it fertile when combined with irrigation.
protected_text: When properly treated and processed, sewage sludge becomes biosolids that offer a small boost to terrain fertility. Useful for harsh environments with limited space to grow. Biosolids also produce a large boost to the fertility of sand which can make it fertile when combined with irrigation.
translated: 如果处理得当，污水污泥会变成生物固体，对地形肥力有一定的促进作用。适用于生长空间有限的恶劣环境。生物固体还可以大大提高沙子的肥力，与灌溉相结合可以使其变得肥沃。

text: Build multi-split air conditioning systems with outdoor units piped to indoor units and freezers.
protected_text: Build multi-split air conditioning systems with outdoor units piped to indoor units and freezers.
translated: 构建多联机空调系统，将室外机通过管道连接到室内机和冰柜。

text: Use pipes, plumbing fixtures, storage tanks, wind pumps and other apparatuses to deliver and drain water and sewage.
protected_text: Use pipes, plumbing fixtures, storage tanks, wind pumps and other apparatuses to deliver and drain water and sewage.
translated: 使用管道、管道装置、储罐、风泵和其他设备来输送和排出水和污水。

text: Build log boilers which can be used to heat rooms and can be placed adjacent to baths to heat bathwater.
protected_text: Build log boilers which can be used to heat rooms and can be placed adjacent to baths to heat bathwater.
translated: 建造可用于房间供暖的原木锅炉，并可放置在浴室附近来加热洗澡水。

text: Build central heating systems with radiators, hot water tanks, boilers and thermostats.
protected_text: Build central heating systems with radiators, hot water tanks, boilers and thermostats.
translated: 建造带有散热器、热水箱、锅炉和恒温器的中央供暖系统。

text: Build geothermal heaters which can be built over geysers to generate heat for central heating and hot water tanks.
protected_text: Build geothermal heaters which can be built over geysers to generate heat for central heating and hot water tanks.
translated: 建造可以建在间歇泉上方的地热加热器，为中央供暖和热水箱产生热量。

text: Build a dedicated room with a sauna heater where colonists can relax and clean, frequent use can reduce the chance of heart attacks.
protected_text: Build a dedicated room with a sauna heater where colonists can relax and clean, frequent use can reduce the chance of heart attacks.
translated: 建造一个带有桑拿加热器的专用房间，殖民者可以在那里放松和清洁，经常使用可以减少心脏病发作的机会。

text: Build modern-style bathroom fixtures like toilets and showers.
protected_text: Build modern-style bathroom fixtures like toilets and showers.
translated: 建造现代风格的浴室设备，如厕所和淋浴间。

text: Powered water pumps for pressurized continuous water pumping.
protected_text: Powered water pumps for pressurized continuous water pumping.
translated: 用于加压连续抽水的动力水泵。

text: Build power showers which halve the time spent showering and improve comfort.
protected_text: Build power showers which halve the time spent showering and improve comfort.
translated: 建造强力淋浴，可将淋浴时间减少一半并提高舒适度。

text: Build comfortable, self cleaning, super efficient smart toilets.
protected_text: Build comfortable, self cleaning, super efficient smart toilets.
translated: 打造舒适、自清洁、超高效的智能厕所。

text: Build hot tubs which can be used for hydrotherapy, relaxation, and pleasure.
protected_text: Build hot tubs which can be used for hydrotherapy, relaxation, and pleasure.
translated: 建造热浴缸，可用于水疗、放松和娱乐。

text: Build industrial-scale water pumps and storage tanks.
protected_text: Build industrial-scale water pumps and storage tanks.
translated: 建造工业规模的水泵和储罐。

text: Drill deeper wells to access a much larger area of ground water.
protected_text: Drill deeper wells to access a much larger area of ground water.
translated: 钻更深的井以获得更大面积的地下水。

text: Build washing machines that can wash clothes so well that you couldn't even tell someone died wearing it!
protected_text: Build washing machines that can wash clothes so well that you couldn't even tell someone died wearing it!
translated: 建造可以很好地洗衣服的洗衣机，以至于你甚至看不出有人穿着它死了！

text: Build water filtration systems which treat the water supply, eliminating the risk of disease.
protected_text: Build water filtration systems which treat the water supply, eliminating the risk of disease.
translated: 建立水过滤系统来处理供水，消除疾病风险。

text: Craft bionics that help to process bodily waste and manage personal hygiene.
protected_text: Craft bionics that help to process bodily waste and manage personal hygiene.
translated: 制作有助于处理身体废物和管理个人卫生的仿生学。

text: Build septic tanks which accumulate sewage and provide moderate treatment of sewage.
protected_text: Build septic tanks which accumulate sewage and provide moderate treatment of sewage.
translated: 建设化粪池积存污水，并对污水进行适度处理。

text: Build large sewage treatment systems which accumulate large amounts of sewage and provide fast treatment of sewage.
protected_text: Build large sewage treatment systems which accumulate large amounts of sewage and provide fast treatment of sewage.
translated: 建设大型污水处理系统，积累大量污水，实现污水快速处理。

text: Build sprinklers that can irrigate soil to improve fertility.
protected_text: Build sprinklers that can irrigate soil to improve fertility.

text: Build sprinklers that suppress fires with a spray of water.
protected_text: Build sprinklers that suppress fires with a spray of water.

text: Compact high-efficiency recycling nodes that recover and reuse water from showers and sinks.
protected_text: Compact high-efficiency recycling nodes that recover and reuse water from showers and sinks.

text: Extract and sublimate volatile ices trapped beneath asteroid regolith.
protected_text: Extract and sublimate volatile ices trapped beneath asteroid regolith.

text: A multiplier on how quickly a creature becomes thirsty.
protected_text: A multiplier on how quickly a creature becomes thirsty.

text: A multiplier on how quickly a creatures hygiene level falls.
protected_text: A multiplier on how quickly a creatures hygiene level falls.

text: A multiplier on how quickly a creatures bladder level falls.
protected_text: A multiplier on how quickly a creatures bladder level falls.

text: Steel tiles in a mosaic pattern, stylish in bathrooms or kitchens.
protected_text: Steel tiles in a mosaic pattern, stylish in bathrooms or kitchens.
translated: 马赛克图案的钢制瓷砖，在浴室或厨房里很时尚。
用于连接管道物体的管道。
用于连接管道物体的管道（隐藏）。

text: Opens or closes connections between pipes.
protected_text: Opens or closes connections between pipes.

连接空调机组的管道。 （隐）

text: Thin door which only blocks line of sight to people using bathroom fixtures. Does not create new rooms or prevent heat loss.
protected_text: Thin door which only blocks line of sight to people using bathroom fixtures. Does not create new rooms or prevent heat loss.

text: A pit latrine that collects faeces in a hole in the ground. Must be emptied manually, or can be plumbed.\n14L per use
protected_text: A pit latrine that collects faeces in a hole in the ground. Must be emptied manually, or can be plumbed.(PH_1)14L per use

坑式厕所，将粪便收集在地上的一个洞里。必须手动清空，或者可以通过管道连接。
每次使用 14L

text: Accesses ground water. Water must be hauled to a water tub before it can be used for washing or drinking.
protected_text: Accesses ground water. Water must be hauled to a water tub before it can be used for washing or drinking.
translated: 获取地下水。水必须先被拖到水桶中才能用于洗涤或饮用。

text: Tub of water used for personal hygiene. Must be regularly refilled with fresh water, also fills with rain water. Can also be used for drinking if thirst is enabled.
protected_text: Tub of water used for personal hygiene. Must be regularly refilled with fresh water, also fills with rain water. Can also be used for drinking if thirst is enabled.
translated: 用于个人卫生的一桶水。必须定期补充淡水，也可补充雨水。如果口渴，也可用于饮用。

text: Trough of water used by animals, a service box with a ballcock valve automatically refills the water when the level is low, also refills in rain.
protected_text: Trough of water used by animals, a service box with a ballcock valve automatically refills the water when the level is low, also refills in rain.
translated: 动物使用的水槽中，带有浮球阀的服务箱会在水位低时自动补充水，在下雨时也会补充水。

text: Bowl of water used by animals.
protected_text: Bowl of water used by animals.

text: An indoor faeces and urine collection box for small animals.
protected_text: An indoor faeces and urine collection box for small animals.
translated: 室内小动物粪便、尿液收集箱。

text: Eliminates fecal sludge by burning it as fuel. Can also be used for disposing of corpses or other detritus. Colonists may become sick if they spend too long near burning waste.
protected_text: Eliminates fecal sludge by burning it as fuel. Can also be used for disposing of corpses or other detritus. Colonists may become sick if they spend too long near burning waste.

text: A water fountain used for drinking and washing.
protected_text: A water fountain used for drinking and washing.
translated: 用于饮用和洗涤的饮水机。

text: Everything but a kitchen sink. Increases room cleanliness.
protected_text: Everything but a kitchen sink. Increases room cleanliness.
translated: 除了厨房水槽之外什么都有。提高房间清洁度。

text: Comfortable, self cleaning, unblockable, super efficient smart toilet. Provides the optimum multi-functional experience with automatic cleansing and deodorization.\n7L per use
protected_text: Comfortable, self cleaning, unblockable, super efficient smart toilet. Provides the optimum multi-functional experience with automatic cleansing and deodorization.(PH_1)7L per use
translated:
舒适、自清洁、畅通无阻、超高效的智能马桶。通过自动清洁和除臭提供最佳的多功能体验。
每次使用 7L

text: Vacuum toilet that doesn't require water and jettisons all waste into space via sewage dump ports.
protected_text: Vacuum toilet that doesn't require water and jettisons all waste into space via sewage dump ports.
translated: 真空厕所不需要水，并通过污水倾倒口将所有废物丢弃到太空中。

text: A small mat used next to a bathtub to absorb water.
protected_text: A small mat used next to a bathtub to absorb water.
translated: 浴缸旁边用来吸水的小垫子。

text: Heats water on demand and does not need a hot water tank, cleans twice as fast\n90L per wash
protected_text: Heats water on demand and does not need a hot water tank, cleans twice as fast(PH_1)90L per wash
translated:
按需加热水，无需 性感的 水箱，清洁速度提高一倍
 每次洗涤 90 升

text: Swimming pool used for hydrotherapy, relaxation, or pleasure. Must be filled with water from water towers first.
protected_text: Swimming pool used for hydrotherapy, relaxation, or pleasure. Must be filled with water from water towers first.
translated: 游泳池用于水疗、放松或娱乐。必须先从水塔注满水。

text: Hot tub used for hydrotherapy, relaxation, or pleasure. Filled with water from water towers on first use. Self-heated and does not require a sewage outlet.
protected_text: Hot tub used for hydrotherapy, relaxation, or pleasure. Filled with water from water towers on first use. Self-heated and does not require a sewage outlet.

text: Washes clothes so well that you can't even tell someone died wearing it!
protected_text: Washes clothes so well that you can't even tell someone died wearing it!
translated: 衣服洗得很好，你甚至看不出有人穿着它死了！

text: A heater designed specifically for creating a sauna room, using a sauna regularly reduces the risk of heart attacks, heats a room to 60c.
protected_text: A heater designed specifically for creating a sauna room, using a sauna regularly reduces the risk of heart attacks, heats a room to 60c.

text: A heater designed specifically for creating a sauna room, using a sauna regularly reduces the risk of heart attacks, heats a room to 60c.
protected_text: A heater designed specifically for creating a sauna room, using a sauna regularly reduces the risk of heart attacks, heats a room to 60c.
translated: 专为创建桑拿房而设计的加热器，定期使用桑拿房可降低心脏病发作的风险，将房间加热至 60 摄氏度。

text: Accesses ground water which can be pumped by water pumps. The presence of sewage or other pollution will reduce water quality and can cause contamination.
protected_text: Accesses ground water which can be pumped by water pumps. The presence of sewage or other pollution will reduce water quality and can cause contamination.
translated: 获取可用水泵抽取的地下水。污水或其他污染物的存在会降低水质并可能造成污染。

text: Accesses a large area of ground water which can be pumped by water pumps. Deep wells are unaffected by pollution.
protected_text: Accesses a large area of ground water which can be pumped by water pumps. Deep wells are unaffected by pollution.
translated: 获取大面积的地下水，可用水泵抽取。深井不受污染的影响。

text: Stores water for use by plumbed fixtures. Slowly fills when raining. The water must be drained if it becomes contaminated. Capacity: 100.
protected_text: Stores water for use by plumbed fixtures. Slowly fills when raining. The water must be drained if it becomes contaminated. Capacity: 100.
translated: 储存水以供管道装置使用。下雨时慢慢充满。如果水被污染，必须将其排出。容量：100。

text: Stores water for use by plumbed fixtures. The water must be drained if it becomes contaminated. Capacity: 8000.
protected_text: Stores water for use by plumbed fixtures. The water must be drained if it becomes contaminated. Capacity: 8000.
translated: 储存水以供管道装置使用。如果水被污染，必须将其排出。容量：8000。

text: Stores water for use by plumbed fixtures. The water must be drained if it becomes contaminated. Capacity: 50,000.
protected_text: Stores water for use by plumbed fixtures. The water must be drained if it becomes contaminated. Capacity: 50,000.
translated: 储存水以供管道装置使用。如果水被污染，必须将其排出。容量：50,000。

text: Pumps water from wells to water towers. Pumping capacity: 3000 L/day.
protected_text: Pumps water from wells to water towers. Pumping capacity: 3000 L/day.
translated: 将水从井抽到水塔。泵送能力：3000升/天。

text: Pumps water from wells to water towers. Pumping capacity: 1500 L/day.
protected_text: Pumps water from wells to water towers. Pumping capacity: 1500 L/day.
translated: 将水从井抽到水塔。泵送能力：1500 升/天。

text: Pumps water from wells to water towers. Pumping capacity: 10000 L/day.
protected_text: Pumps water from wells to water towers. Pumping capacity: 10000 L/day.
translated: 将水从井抽到水塔。泵送能力：10000升/天。

text: Can be placed anywhere. Sewage will pool and spread on land or disperse in water. Sewage cleans up over time; the presence of trees, water, or rain will speed this up.
protected_text: Can be placed anywhere. Sewage will pool and spread on land or disperse in water. Sewage cleans up over time; the presence of trees, water, or rain will speed this up.
translated: 可以放置在任何地方。污水会在陆地上汇集并扩散或分散在水中。污水会随着时间的推移而清理干净；树木、水或雨水的存在会加速这一过程。

text: Slowly cleans sewage over time. Sewage is directed to septic tanks first. If it reaches full capacity, excess sewage is sent to sewage outlets.
protected_text: Slowly cleans sewage over time. Sewage is directed to septic tanks first. If it reaches full capacity, excess sewage is sent to sewage outlets.
translated: 随着时间的推移慢慢清理污水。污水首先导入化粪池。如果达到满负荷，多余的污水将被送往排污口。

text: Cleans 99.99% of germs! Filters existing water in storage towers, and any water used by fixtures, eliminating the risk of disease.
protected_text: Cleans 99.99% of germs! Filters existing water in storage towers, and any water used by fixtures, eliminating the risk of disease.
translated: 清除99.99%的细菌！过滤储存塔中的现有水以及固定装置使用的任何水，消除疾病风险。

text: A vacuum-sealed sewage expulsion port for use in spacecraft. When connected to a vacuum toilet, it safely ejects waste into the void of space.\nMust be mounted on an exterior wall of a ship.
protected_text: A vacuum-sealed sewage expulsion port for use in spacecraft. When connected to a vacuum toilet, it safely ejects waste into the void of space.(PH_1)Must be mounted on an exterior wall of a ship.
translated:
用于航天器的真空密封污水排放口。当连接到真空马桶时，它可以安全地将废物喷射到太空中。
必须安装在船舶的外墙上。

text: Extracts and sublimates volatile ices trapped beneath asteroid regolith. It produces usable water and generates substantial heat—handle with care when operating in enclosed environments.
protected_text: Extracts and sublimates volatile ices trapped beneath asteroid regolith. It produces usable water and generates substantial heat—handle with care when operating in enclosed environments.
translated: 提取并升华小行星风化层下的挥发性冰。它产生可用水并产生大量热量，在封闭环境中操作时请小心处理。

text: A compact high-efficiency recycling node that recovers and reuses water from showers and sinks.
protected_text: A compact high-efficiency recycling node that recovers and reuses water from showers and sinks.
translated: 紧凑型高效回收节点，可回收和再利用淋浴间和水槽中的水。

text: Stores water for use by plumbed fixtures. The water must be drained if it becomes contaminated. Capacity: 2000.
protected_text: Stores water for use by plumbed fixtures. The water must be drained if it becomes contaminated. Capacity: 2000.
translated: 储存水以供管道装置使用。如果水被污染，必须将其排出。容量：2000。

text: Used to control electric and gas boilers. More than one can be placed. Connects via standard plumbing.
protected_text: Used to control electric and gas boilers. More than one can be placed. Connects via standard plumbing.
translated: 用于控制电锅炉和燃气锅炉。可以放置多个。通过标准管道连接。

text: Produces 2000 heating units for piped radiators and hot water tanks. Heats the room and adjacent baths. Requires wood logs for fuel.
protected_text: Produces 2000 heating units for piped radiators and hot water tanks. Heats the room and adjacent baths. Requires wood logs for fuel.
translated: 生产 2000 个用于管道散热器和 性感的 水箱的加热装置。为房间和相邻的浴室供暖。需要原木作为燃料。

text: Produces 2000 heating units for radiators and hot water tanks. Requires chemfuel for fuel. Can be controlled by thermostats.
protected_text: Produces 2000 heating units for radiators and hot water tanks. Requires chemfuel for fuel. Can be controlled by thermostats.
translated: 生产 2000 个用于散热器和 性感的 水箱的加热装置。需要化学燃料作为燃料。可以通过恒温器控制。

text: Produces a variable amount of heating units for radiators and hot water tanks. Manually controlled power setting. Can be controlled by thermostats.
protected_text: Produces a variable amount of heating units for radiators and hot water tanks. Manually controlled power setting. Can be controlled by thermostats.
translated: 为散热器和热水箱生产数量可变的加热装置。手动控制功率设置。可以通过恒温器控制。

text: Uses sunlight to heat hot water tanks and radiators. 0-2000 units of heating power depending on light level and ambient temperature.
protected_text: Uses sunlight to heat hot water tanks and radiators. 0-2000 units of heating power depending on light level and ambient temperature.
translated: 利用阳光加热热水箱和散热器。 0-2000 单位的加热功率取决于光照强度和环境温度。

text: Uses geothermal heat to heat hot water tanks and radiators. 3700 units of heating.
protected_text: Uses geothermal heat to heat hot water tanks and radiators. 3700 units of heating.
translated: 使用地热来加热 性感的 水箱和散热器。供暖3700单位。

text: Stores hot running water for showers and baths. Connect to any boiler to heat.
protected_text: Stores hot running water for showers and baths. Connect to any boiler to heat.
translated: 储存热淋浴和浴缸的自来水。连接到任何锅炉进行加热。

text: Three times the output of a standard radiator. Useful for larger rooms. Requires 300 heating units.
protected_text: Three times the output of a standard radiator. Useful for larger rooms. Requires 300 heating units.
translated: 输出功率是标准散热器的三倍。对于较大的房间很有用。需要300个加热装置。
令人印象深刻的浴室毛巾架。

text: Multi-split air conditioner unit. Place outdoors and pipe to indoor units or freezer units. Power mode selection with 100-1000 cooling units capacity.
protected_text: Multi-split air conditioner unit. Place outdoors and pipe to indoor units or freezer units. Power mode selection with 100-1000 cooling units capacity.
translated: 多联机空调机组。放置在室外并通过管道连接到室内机或冷冻机。功率模式选择，具有100-1000冷却机组容量。

text: Indoor air-con unit for rooms. Connect to outdoor air-con units. Requires 100 cooling units.
protected_text: Indoor air-con unit for rooms. Connect to outdoor air-con units. Requires 100 cooling units.
translated: 房间的室内空调装置。连接到室外空调装置。需要 100 个冷却装置。

text: Freezer unit for creating a walk-in freezer. Connect to outdoor air-con units. Requires 300 cooling units.
protected_text: Freezer unit for creating a walk-in freezer. Connect to outdoor air-con units. Requires 300 cooling units.
translated: 用于创建步入式冷冻室的冷冻装置。连接到室外空调装置。需要 300 个冷却装置。

text: Waters the surrounding area once every morning to improve the fertility of the soil through the day. Uses 1000L each morning at max radius.
protected_text: Waters the surrounding area once every morning to improve the fertility of the soil through the day. Uses 1000L each morning at max radius.
translated: 每天早上给周围区域浇水一次，以提高全天土壤的肥力。每天早上在最大半径处使用 1000L。

text: Triggered by fire or high temperature. Douses flames with a spray of water.
protected_text: Triggered by fire or high temperature. Douses flames with a spray of water.
translated: 因火灾或高温而引发。用水雾扑灭火焰。

text: A composter for turning sewage into fertilizer for increasing the fertility of diggable terrain.
protected_text: A composter for turning sewage into fertilizer for increasing the fertility of diggable terrain.
translated: 一种将污水转化为肥料以增加可挖掘地形肥力的堆肥器。

text: A receptacle used by a bedridden patient for urine and faeces.
protected_text: A receptacle used by a bedridden patient for urine and faeces.
translated: 卧床病人用来盛放尿液和粪便的容器。

text: When properly treated and processed, sewage sludge becomes biosolids that offer a small boost to terrain fertility. Useful for harsh environments with limited space to grow. Biosolids also produce a large boost to the fertility of sand which can make it fertile when combined with irrigation.
protected_text: When properly treated and processed, sewage sludge becomes biosolids that offer a small boost to terrain fertility. Useful for harsh environments with limited space to grow. Biosolids also produce a large boost to the fertility of sand which can make it fertile when combined with irrigation.
translated: 如果处理得当，污水污泥会变成生物固体，对地形肥力有一定的促进作用。适用于生长空间有限的恶劣环境。生物固体还可以大大提高沙子的肥力，与灌溉相结合可以使其变得肥沃。

text: A barrel filled with fecal sludge. Can be dumped, burned, or composted into biosolids.
protected_text: A barrel filled with fecal sludge. Can be dumped, burned, or composted into biosolids.
translated: 装满粪便污泥的桶。可以倾倒、燃烧或堆肥成生物固体。

text: Drank a bottle of contaminated water.
protected_text: Drank a bottle of contaminated water.

text: Someone saw me bathing and it made me uncomfortable.
protected_text: Someone saw me bathing and it made me uncomfortable.

text: Someone walked in on me while I was using the toilet.
protected_text: Someone walked in on me while I was using the toilet.

text: I couldn't hold it in any longer and soiled myself.
protected_text: I couldn't hold it in any longer and soiled myself.

text: I had a nice hot shower.
protected_text: I had a nice hot shower.

text: The heated pool was very relaxing.
protected_text: The heated pool was very relaxing.

text: I had a nice hot bath.
protected_text: I had a nice hot bath.

protected_text: I had a nice refreshing cold bath.

text: I had a nice refreshing cold shower.
protected_text: I had a nice refreshing cold shower.

text: I had to relieve myself outside in the open.
protected_text: I had to relieve myself outside in the open.

text: My bathroom is an awful place.
protected_text: My bathroom is an awful place.
translated: 我的浴室是个很糟糕的地方。

text: My bathroom is very interesting. I like it.
protected_text: My bathroom is very interesting. I like it.

text: My bathroom is actually slightly impressive. I like it.
protected_text: My bathroom is actually slightly impressive. I like it.

protected_text: My bathroom is impressive. I love it!

text: My bathroom is very impressive. This is the best place ever!
protected_text: My bathroom is very impressive. This is the best place ever!

text: My bathroom is extremely impressive. This is the best place ever!
protected_text: My bathroom is extremely impressive. This is the best place ever!

protected_text: My bathroom is unbelievably impressive. This is the best place ever!
translated: 我的浴室令人难以置信地令人印象深刻。这是有史以来最好的地方！

text: My bathroom is the best place one can ever imagine. It's wonderful.
protected_text: My bathroom is the best place one can ever imagine. It's wonderful.
translated: 我的浴室是人们能想象到的最好的地方。太棒了。

text: I smell like I have been swimming in sewage.
protected_text: I smell like I have been swimming in sewage.
translated: 我闻就像我一直在污水中游泳一样。

text: I need to go so bad I'm about to burst!
protected_text: I need to go so bad I'm about to burst!
translated: 我需要变得如此糟糕，我快要爆炸了！

text: I need to go to the bathroom.
protected_text: I need to go to the bathroom.

text: [PAWN_nameDef] is obsessed with germs and will wash much more frequently than normal.
protected_text: (PH_1) is obsessed with germs and will wash much more frequently than normal.
translated: [PAWN_nameDef] 很容易沾染细菌，并且会比平时更频繁地洗澡。

text: [PAWN_nameDef] is very hygienic and will wash more frequently.
protected_text: (PH_1) is very hygienic and will wash more frequently.

text: [PAWN_nameDef] is very unhygienic and will wash less frequently.
protected_text: (PH_1) is very unhygienic and will wash less frequently.
translated: [PAWN_nameDef]非常不卫生，清洗频率会降低。

text: [PAWN_nameDef] has very low standards of cleanliness and will only wash when they absolutely have to.
protected_text: (PH_1) has very low standards of cleanliness and will only wash when they absolutely have to.
translated: [PAWN_nameDef] 的清洁标准非常低，只有在绝对必要时才会清洗。
